item.title: '90s Horror Franchise Gets A Major Update That Could Hint At Kevin Bacon's Return
item.description: A fan-favorite '90s horror franchise gets a major update from its original creators that also teases Kevin Bacon may return for its next installment.

item.title: The Odyssey vs Dune 3, Nolan vs Villeneuve In 2026... I Never Knew I Wanted This So Bad
item.description: The upcoming box office battle between Christopher Nolan's The Odyssey and Denis Villeneuve's Dune: Part Three is going to be a major cinematic event.

item.title: Even Madame Web Made Over Double The Box Office Of Foxâ€™s Lowest-Grossing X-Men Movie
item.description: Madame Web is far from a Marvel success story, but compared to a 2020 Fox X-Men release, Madame Web did manage to more than double its box office.
